abstract: The agency responsible for creating campaigns for United Parcel Service is deciding to wipe the whiteboard clean. The Martin Agency in Richmond, Va., which has been the creative agency for U.P.S. in the United States since April 2001, is withdrawing from a review for the account.

lead_paragraph: The agency responsible for creating campaigns for United Parcel Service is deciding to wipe the whiteboard clean.

headline.main: Agency Sends (United) Parcel on Its Way
